response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item not only boasts cutting-edge technology but also offers unparalleled performance and user experience. Given its unique features and market positioning, we believe it holds significant value. For you, this could be an opportunity to gain a competitive edge or enhance your business operations. Considering its worth and potential impact, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product for $15,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 15000}
